evidence.claim: Ascent Respiratory Care utilizes AWS for cloud services, ensuring scalability and security for health data.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, indicating the use of secure transactions and data handling in health tech.
Ascent integrates healthcare data using FHIR standards, facilitating interoperability with EHRs.
The integration patterns include EDI transactions for medical billing and claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Ascent Respiratory Care integrates EDI for claims and eligibility, indicating X12 usage.
